overview: The F#&!wits is a story following Andy, the guitarist of a small time pop-punk band. With the impending birth of he and his girlfriend Beth's child back in Pittsburgh, and the infamous record label Inky Squid wanting to sign them after another performance across the country in LA, Andy is faced with the difficult question: can he follow his career passions and love a growing family at the same time, or must one be sacrificed for the other?
title: The F#&!wits
